message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which still gives you a good price considering the value of this product. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. However, I am still unable to meet you at $11,000. I am willing to pay up to $10,500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit too low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,750.  This would be a fair price for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested.
